## Source: kam193 (11b6725737eb8375047c6b67a77daaeaddf22a076fcaff3c1bdf3462a578de0b)
During installation, the package attempts to exfiltrate browser history


---

Category: MALICIOUS - The campaign has clearly malicious intent, like infostealers.
Campaign: 2025-07-jirawrapped
Reasons (based on the campaign):
 - exfiltration_browser_data
